name: Twitter
description:
Embed lists of tweets from Twitter. Lists can be derived from search results, or from a user's twitter feed.

Any key and secret will work.

name: MIT OCW
short_description: OCW lectures, videos, etc. from MIT

name: Public Collections
description:
Browse or search through multiple content repositories including MIT OCW, Softchalk Connect, Khan Academy, USA Today, etc.

Any key and secret will work.

name: TED Ed
description:
TED Ed is a collection of quality videos that can be used for instructional purposes. This tool lets you search for and embed TED Ed vidoes in your course material.

Any key and secret will work.

name: Graph Builder
description:
Build and embed rich interactive graphs into course content.

Any key and secret will work.
short_description: Build and embed rich interactive graphs into course content

name: Internet Archive
description:
The Internet Archive hosts public domain video, audio, books, images and other resources. Links to any of these resources can easily be added to any course content.

Any key and secret will work.

name: OpenTapestry
description:
Browse and insert private and public collections tapestries from OpenTapestry. Each tapestry is a collection of content from anywhere on the web. Content can be annotated and enhanced to tailor it to your specific learning environment.

Register on OpenTapestry to retrieve your consumer key and shared secret.

name: Nook Study
description: This would allow you to insert link as items in a module that the teacher can use to specify a set of require reading materials for the course, or to link to specific textbook material that will load for students.

name: SchoolTube
description:
SchoolTube is a collection of videos uploaded from schools that is publicly searchable. Videos can be inserted as links or embedded in course material.

Any key and secret will work for this tool.

name: McGraw Hill Tegrity
description: Supports course-level support for the Tegrity lecture capture solution. Visit the Tegrity web site for instructions on how to sign up and get a consumer key and shared secret.

name: Panopto
description: Supports course-level support for the Tegrity lecture capture solution. Visit the Tegrity web site for instructions on how to sign up and get a consumer key and shared secret.

name: Piazza
description: Piazza is a new style of discussion/Q&A site with a focus on educational institutions. This integration adds a link to the course navigation (if supported) for Piazza discussions. Contact Piazza for instructions on getting a consumer key and secret.

name: Slideshare
description:
Slideshare is a site that enables viewing and interacting with presentations without needing desktop software. Search for and embed Creative Commons-licensed presentations hosted on Slideshare.

Any key and secret will work.

name: Quizlet Flash Cards
description:
Search for and embed publicly available question sets on Quizlet. Questions can be embedded as flash cards, review, or as a study game.

Any key and secret will work.
short_description: Flash card and study help tools

name: Cengage Learning
description: Build and link to interactive educational content called MindLinks, provided by Cengage. Contact Cengage to receive a consumer key and secret.

name: CourseSmart
description: Add links to rich online textbooks, chapters, etc.

name: ChemVantage
description: Lets teachers build and distribute science education focused homework, video lectures, graded quizzes, etc. Contact admin@chemvantage.org about getting a consumer key and shared secret.

name: Elgg
description:
Open source social networking. You can add a link to your course navigation that will send users to an Elgg network already logged in.

You'll need to install the LTI plugin for Elgg in order for this integration to work.

name: Noteflight
description: Build musical annotations on the web. This could be useful in music classes for both teaching and assigning to students as homework.

name: Courseload
description: Add links to rich online textbooks, chapters, etc.

name: Khan Academy
description:
Search for and embed Khan Academy lessons into course material. Khan Academy focuses on short lessons on math, science, etc.

Any key and secret will work.
short_description: Online video lessons for math, science, etc.

name: MyOpenMath
description: Internet Math Assessment System lets you create and administer auto-graded math assessments to students. It has experimental support for passing grades back to the LMS. Visit the web site for instructions on how to sign up and get a consumer key and shared secret.

name: Wikipedia
description:
Search through English Wikipedia articles and link to or embed these articles into course material.

Any key and secret will work.

name: Campus Pack
description:
Load Campus Pack inside the LMS to add ePortfolios, blogs, wikis, etc.

Directions for configuring Campus Pack:
  1. Login to Campus Pack as an administrator.
  2. Click Administrator Portal.
  3. Click External System Connectors.
  4. Click Create.
  5. Click Basic LTI Tool Producer.
  6. Fill out the form. These values will be important later.
    1. Set Connector Id to blti-producer.
    2. Set Name to your institution name.
    3. Do not alter Shared Secret Key.
    4. Ignore URL.
    5. Ignore IP address.
  7. Click Submit.

name: Pathbrite
description: Pathbrite is an ePortfolio tool that can be integrated into the LMS.

name: PebblePad
description: PebblePad is an ePortfolio tool that can be integrated into the LMS.

name: Wikispaces
description: Wikispaces offers free wikis for educational purposes. Private label sites can be configured to use LTI for authentication.
config_directions: Visit the Wikispages LTI configuration page for directions on configuring your Wikispaces private label site.

name: MediaSite
description: MediaSite is a webcasting and lecture capture solution that can be integrated into the LMS.

name: Aleks
description: Aleks is a site that offers customized assessment and learning resources that can be integrated into the LMS.

name: PlaceKitten
description:
PlaceKitten lets you embed perfectly-size kitten images into any online content. You pick the dimensions, whether it's color or grayscale, and then embed it into your content.

Any key and secret will work.

name: YouTube
description:
Search publicly available YouTube videos. A new icon will show up in your course rich editor letting you search YouTube and click to embed videos in your course material.

Any key and secret will work.

name: TitanPad
description:
TitanPad offers free, public collaborative documents based on EtherPad. Every placement of a TitanPad in your content will result in a new pad being created. Students can also chat while working together on a pad.

Any key and secret will work.

name: Bumpin Social Chat
description:
Bumpin social chat allows you to add chat rooms to web pages. This tool lets you add a chat room as a course navigation link for your students.

Any key and secret will work.

name: SoftChalk Connect
short_description: Reusable content built using SoftChalk Connect

name: Merlot
description: Search through and insert links to multimedia resources curated and collected by MERLOT. This collection is only a subset of some of the higher-rated resources from MERLOT. For the full list of resources, please visit merlot.org.

name: Storify
description:
Storify lets users organize events from across the web into a single cohesive "story". Search through and link to these social stories within your course material.

Any key and secret will work.
short_description: Search and link to social stories

name: Google Art Project
short_description: Digital tours of famous museum artwork

name: Programr
short_description: Coding challenges in Java, C# and C++
